alert.note: Alert for Cannon; Coffee; De Kalb; Grundy; Putnam; Rutherford; Smith; Van Buren; Warren; White; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 5:00PM CDT until July 18 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Smith County in Middle Tennessee... De Kalb County in Middle Tennessee... Rutherford County in Middle Tennessee... Central Coffee County in Middle Tennessee... Van Buren County in Middle Tennessee... Warren County in Middle Tennessee... Southeastern Wilson County in Middle Tennessee... Northwestern Grundy County in Middle Tennessee... White County in Middle Tennessee... Putnam County in Middle Tennessee... Cannon County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 459 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Gordonsville to 7 miles east of Watertown to 10 miles south of Murfreesboro, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Cookeville, McMinnville, Manchester, Sparta, Smithville, Woodbury, Spencer, Smyrna, Algood, Monterey, Gruetli-Laager, Watertown, Baxter, Gordonsville, Walterhill, Hickman, South Carthage, Altamont and Alexandria. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 241 and 305. Interstate 24 between mile markers 71 and 113. Interstate 840 between mile markers 46 and 63. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Cannon; Coffee; De Kalb; Grundy; Putnam; Rutherford; Smith; Van Buren; Warren; White; Wilson
